pr_title: [ISSUE #5989] Support unique broker-id as identification in controller mode
pr_body:
**Make sure set the target branch to `develop`**

## What is the purpose of the change

<!--
If this PR fixes a GitHub issue, please add `fixes #<XXX>` or `closes #<XXX>`. Please refer to the documentation for more information:
https://docs.github.com/en/issues/tracking-your-work-with-issues/linking-a-pull-request-to-an-issue
-->

fix #<xxx>[5989](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/issues/5989)<!-- <xxx> replace with issue id -->

## Brief changelog

XX

## Verifying this change

XXXX

Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily. Notice, `it would be helpful if you could finish the following 5 checklist(the last one is not necessary)before request the community to review your PR`.

- [x] Make sure there is a [Github issue](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/issues) filed for the change (usually before you start working on it). Trivial changes like typos do not require a Github issue. Your pull request should address just this issue, without pulling in other changes - one PR resolves one issue. 
- [x] Format the pull request title like `[ISSUE #123] Fix UnknownException when host config not exist`. Each commit in the pull request should have a meaningful subject line and body.
- [x] Write a pull request description that is detailed enough to understand what the pull request does, how, and why.
- [x] Write necessary unit-test(over 80% coverage) to verify your logic correction, more mock a little better when cross module dependency exist. If the new feature or significant change is committed, please remember to add integration-test in [test module](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/tree/master/test).
- [x] Run `mvn -B clean apache-rat:check findbugs:findbugs checkstyle:checkstyle` to make sure basic checks pass. Run `mvn clean install -DskipITs` to make sure unit-test pass. Run `mvn clean test-compile failsafe:integration-test`  to make sure integration-test pass.
- [ ] If this contribution is large, please file an [Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement](http://www.apache.org/licenses/#clas).

[{'comment_id': 1112721549, 'comment_body': 'How about `this.localAddress`  rename `this.brokerAddress`?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 21, 8, 33, 8, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mxsm', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1112738599, 'comment_body': 'Could the enum name be changed to make it more semantically expressive', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 21, 8, 45, 35, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mxsm', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1112738675, 'comment_body': 'BrokerHeartbeatRequestHeader在controller中被用到，在Broker发给nameserver的轻量级心跳中也被用到（详见[RIP-32](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/wiki/RIP-32-Slave-Acting-Master-Mode)），为了保持兼容性，建议仍然是CFNullable，在controller处对没有brokerId的进行拦截（提醒用户升级）', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 21, 8, 45, 39, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1112739775, 'comment_body': '要不叫brokerControllerId，与brokerId做一个区分。', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 21, 8, 46, 36, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1112760071, 'comment_body': 'How about  TempBrokerMetadata  extends BrokerMetadata ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 21, 9, 3, 33, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mxsm', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1112774467, 'comment_body': '这里用FIRST_SLAVE_ID语义不是很好，这是brokerControlllerId编号，跟slaveId没什么关系', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 21, 9, 13, 37, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1112788862, 'comment_body': 'response whether to determine?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 21, 9, 24, 19, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mxsm', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1112797642, 'comment_body': 'registerSuccess method name、this.brokerOuterAPI.registerSuccess、 and request code  REGISTER_SUCCESS can rename. These names give me the understanding that the registration is successful
', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 21, 9, 31, 31, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mxsm', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1113708700, 'comment_body': '1.建议RequestCode前都增加一个CONTROLLER_的前缀

Yep, I rename it!', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 2, 22, 5, 28, 17, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'TheR1sing3un', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1125801722, 'comment_body': '注册成功是否也能当作一次心跳，就和之前的一样', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 6, 2, 9, 52, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1125818318, 'comment_body': '建议取消这个参数，这个参数更多是内部实现，不需要用户配置', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 6, 2, 39, 7, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1125868400, 'comment_body': '> 注册成功是否也能当作一次心跳，就和之前的一样

原本是这么想的，但是我发现需要加的心跳参数太多了，而且这个接口也只有注册流程中会用到(注册流程我们也会通过手动触发心跳来保证当前节点的活跃)。注册成功后，心跳定时任务就启动了。', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 6, 3, 56, 4, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'TheR1sing3un', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1125893831, 'comment_body': '> 

好的', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 6, 4, 32, 57, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1126054850, 'comment_body': '如果brokerConfig中的brokerName与metadata文件中的brokerName不一致，建议日志告警出来（提问问题，如果是重建，建议删除xxx文件），然后退出。', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 6, 8, 0, 33, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1126754164, 'comment_body': '> 如果brokerConfig中的brokerName与metadata文件中的brokerName不一致，建议日志告警出来（提问问题，如果是重建，建议删除xxx文件），然后退出。

done~', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 6, 16, 53, 43, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'TheR1sing3un', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1126754353, 'comment_body': '> 建议取消这个参数，这个参数更多是内部实现，不需要用户配置

done~', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 6, 16, 53, 53, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'TheR1sing3un', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1127201779, 'comment_body': '这里存在一个并发问题。如果节点第一次启动失败（比如没有master在brokerSet中），过程中选举又成功了，通知节点变为Slave（走的notifyBrokerRoleChange）。节点第二次启动的时候这里直接跳过brokerElect，导致isIsolated一直为true，Slave节点无法正常上线。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21963954/223287056-a9a8500b-c93a-438f-b611-80a45bebed75.png)
', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 7, 0, 25, 54, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1127721267, 'comment_body': '> 

done~', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 7, 11, 29, 49, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'TheR1sing3un', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1130519579, 'comment_body': '这边是不是不需要连续重试，如果失败直接等待再次重跑startBasicService', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 9, 6, 0, 4, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1132512232, 'comment_body': '命令中是brokerAddress，这里变成了brokerId，还是都改成brokerId吧', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 10, 15, 19, 36, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1132514433, 'comment_body': '这里如果都是brokerId，是否要判断一下Long的格式是否符合？', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 10, 15, 21, 3, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1133179454, 'comment_body': '建议单独搞一个文档，介绍brokerId持久化方案的背景（解决的问题）、设计思想、兼容性升级方案，然后在部署文档中用链接引过去', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 3, 12, 3, 20, 9, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'RongtongJin', 'type': 'User'}]

pr_title: [ISSUE #6346] Support asynchronously notify brokers when their roles has been changed
pr_body:
1. support asynchronous notify brokers when roles changed

**Make sure set the target branch to `develop`**

## What is the purpose of the change

<!--
If this PR fixes a GitHub issue, please add `fixes #<XXX>` or `closes #<XXX>`. Please refer to the documentation for more information:
https://docs.github.com/en/issues/tracking-your-work-with-issues/linking-a-pull-request-to-an-issue
-->

fix #6346 <!-- <xxx> replace with issue id -->

## Brief changelog

XX

## Verifying this change

XXXX

Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily. Notice, `it would be helpful if you could finish the following 5 checklist(the last one is not necessary)before request the community to review your PR`.

- [x] Make sure there is a [Github issue](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/issues) filed for the change (usually before you start working on it). Trivial changes like typos do not require a Github issue. Your pull request should address just this issue, without pulling in other changes - one PR resolves one issue. 
- [x] Format the pull request title like `[ISSUE #123] Fix UnknownException when host config not exist`. Each commit in the pull request should have a meaningful subject line and body.
- [x] Write a pull request description that is detailed enough to understand what the pull request does, how, and why.
- [x] Write necessary unit-test(over 80% coverage) to verify your logic correction, more mock a little better when cross module dependency exist. If the new feature or significant change is committed, please remember to add integration-test in [test module](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/tree/master/test).
- [x] Run `mvn -B clean apache-rat:check findbugs:findbugs checkstyle:checkstyle` to make sure basic checks pass. Run `mvn clean install -DskipITs` to make sure unit-test pass. Run `mvn clean test-compile failsafe:integration-test`  to make sure integration-test pass.
- [ ] If this contribution is large, please file an [Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement](http://www.apache.org/licenses/#clas).

pr_review_comments: [{'comment_id': 1201632535, 'comment_body': "You'd better check whether the file is a symbolic link before recursion.", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 5, 23, 6, 58, 3, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'caigy', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1201635268, 'comment_body': "It's unnecessary to initialize `fileSize` as 0 as it's assigned right after initialization.", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 5, 23, 7, 0, 4, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'caigy', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1201728179, 'comment_body': 'Any reasons to add this dependency?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 5, 23, 7, 59, 15, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'caigy', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1201740693, 'comment_body': "It's unnecessary to use type `Long` for the number of brokers, `Integer` is enough.", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 5, 23, 8, 6, 8, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'caigy', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1201845199, 'comment_body': "- Whether a broker is 'active' should be checked by `isBrokerActive()`, rather than just checking if it is in`brokerLiveTable`. - IMO this method provides a dynamic view of `brokerLiveTable`. As the returned data structure is used only in metrics instead of heat beat of brokers, it seems inappropriate to add methods in the interface `BrokerHeartbeatManager`. Placing it in metric-related packages may be more appropriate.", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 5, 23, 8, 55, 41, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'caigy', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1202477872, 'comment_body': '> Any reasons to add this dependency? We need to use log as mertric exporter. ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 5, 23, 14, 50, 18, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'TheR1sing3un', 'type': 'User'}]
